name: Undone (Davis G. See)
description:
Undone is a text adventure about time travel, choice, and enacting change. You are a young gay professional stuck in a mind-numbing office job until the day your office is attacked by a force from another planet, called Gatz. Their power is mysterious and overwhelming, and for some reason they are hunting you. That means it's up to you to join up with the rebel forces that are working hard to save Earth from tyranny. 

  • discover the secret of Gatz's power and save your planet!
  • experience multiple endings which open up based on your choices!
  • make new friends and court cute boys!
  • play through alternate paths to uncover more mysteries and character backstories!
  • act rashly, die, and undo your mistakes!

An earlier version of this game was published as part of IntroComp 2018.

Content warning: contains mild descriptions of violence, including gun violence, and sexuality.
